summary: This bill, the "No Gratuities for Governing Act of 2025," amends Title 18 of the United States Code (Section 666) to clarify and strengthen the laws against illegal gratuities concerning programs receiving Federal funds. It redefines offenses related to giving or receiving anything of value ($1,000 or more) in exchange for official acts related to transactions worth $5,000 or more, and increases the potential prison sentence for certain offenses. It aims to increase transparency and deter corruption in government and organizations utilizing federal funds.
